title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate solution for all your battery troubles! With its impressive 4000A peak current and 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter is designed to jump-start all gas engines and up to 10L diesel engines, ensuring that you're never left stranded on the road again.

This battery booster power pack comes with a 12V Auto Jump Box, equipped with a powerful LED light that provides bright illumination in case of emergencies or low-light situations. The USB Quick Charge 3.0 feature allows you to charge your devices at lightning-fast speed, making it the perfect companion for your road trips.

Safety is our top priority, which is why this jump starter comes with an intelligent protection system that safeguards against short circuits, low battery voltage, high temperatures, and reverse connections. You can rely on this jump starter to keep you and your vehicle safe.

Not only is this jump starter packed with power and safety features, but it is also highly portable. Its compact design allows you to easily carry it in your glove compartment or backpack. The rugged design and metal clamps ensure durability and longevity.

With a charging speed that's 75% faster than ordinary power banks, this jump starter is a game-changer. It can be used for a wide range of vehicles, including cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. On a full charge, it can start your vehicle up to 40 times!

Included in the package are essential accessories such as Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and User Manual. Our 24-hour online after-sales team is always ready to assist you with any queries or concerns.

Don't let a dead battery ruin your day. Invest in the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter and experience the peace of mind that comes with having a reliable and powerful backup for your vehicle. Get yours today and never worry about being stranded again!

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate power solution for your vehicle! With its impressive 4000A peak current and a massive 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter is capable of jump-starting all gas engines and even up to 10L diesel engines. 

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box and an LED light, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter ensures a hassle-free jump-starting experience, even in low light conditions. The LED light features multiple modes including flashlight, SOS, and strobe, providing you with all the illumination you need.

But that's not all! This jump starter also features a USB Quick Charge 3.0 port, allowing you to charge your devices at lightning-fast speeds. The intelligent protection systems, including protection against short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection, ensure the safety of both you and your vehicle.

Designed with portability in mind, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is compact and lightweight. It comes with a rugged design and metal clamps for durability and ease of use. 

With its 75% faster charging speed compared to ordinary power banks, this jump starter is a game-changer. It can be used for a variety of vehicles, including cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. On a full charge, it can jump-start your vehicle up to 40 times!

The package includes the AVAPOW Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and User Manual. And don't worry about after-sales support, as we have a dedicated 24-hour online team ready to assist you.

Don't miss out on this incredible deal! Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and never worry about a dead battery again. Adapter not included.
